TopicTitle: Add Burn Together functions to EVA Kerbals?

Articles.Content:
I looked at the Module Manager patches available for stock parts, for instance, adding low level power generation to command pods. These just hack part CFGs and that's pretty neat. There's a similar Module Manager patch to add Burn Together functionality to command pods instead of requiring special parts.

Is there a way to do this to kerbals on EVA? Enable Burn Together functionality for that?

I've already tried EVA Follower, and this can be used to set kerbals on walking paths and such, but the following behaviour is odd where the following kerbal swaps between running and walking when the leader is always running. And there's wanting to be silly, like putting several kerbals into a marching division or dance troupe.

--
